prequestions.preinstructions: I'm going to be asking you some specific questions about your physical and mental condition. Now I'd like to see how you are feeling at the moment.

questions.question: Is it a good day, a bad day, or an average day for you?
Why does it seem like a bad day? (DO NOT PROMPT)
questions.postinstructions: If only reason is mentioned, ask "Is there anything else that makes this a bad day?"

emotional: Feeling overstressed (financial, work, or family problems)

questions.question: Where were you born?
When were you born?
How old are you?
How many minutes are in an hour? OR how many days are in a year?

inputs.name: minutes
inputs.label: Minutes/Days
inputs.instructions: Score 2 if either question is answered correctly.

questions.question: In what direction does the sun set?
I am going to say 3 words for you to remember. Repeat them after I've said all three.

inputs.name: recallb
inputs.label: 6b. If the participant can't answer the first time, elaborate and repeat up to 3 times. Score best performance.

questions.question: I shall say some numbers, and you repeat what I said backwards. For example, if I say 1-2, you say 2-1. OK? Remember: you repeat what I say backwards.

inputs.name: dbc
inputs.preinstructions: If score is both 0 in DBA and DBB, score DBC 0.

questions.question: What 3 words did I ask you to remember?

scores.label: After: "One word was something to wear."
After: "Was it SHOES, SHIRT, or SOCKS?"
After: "Was it BLUE, BLACK or BROWN?"
After: "One word was a good personal quality."
After: "Was it HONESTY, MODESTY, or CHARITY?"

sections.instructions: For the first error only, score 0, but provide the correct answer. If subject asks examiner to repeat answer from previous step, provide the answer but score 0 at that step.

inputs.name: subtraction2
inputs.label: 9b. And take away 3 from that equals?  (94)

inputs.name: subtraction3
inputs.label: 9c. Repeat "and take away 3 again equals?" three more times. One point each. (91) (88) (85)
inputs.preinstructions: If a and b are both scored 0, score part c. 0.

questions.question: What is today's date?

scores.label: Missed by one or two days

questions.question: What day of the week is today?
What season are we in?
What ________ are we in?
Is this place a hospital (clinic), a store, or a home?
What animals have 4 legs? Tell me as many as you can.

sections.preinstructions: 15. An orange and a banana are both fruit.

questions.preinstructions: Coach for correct answer for first one only.

inputs.label: 15a. An arm and a leg are both ______?
inputs.name: armAndLeg

questions.question: What actions would you take if you saw your neighbor's house catching fire?
questions.postinstructions: Prompt "What else might you do?" once only, if necessary.

questions.question: What actions would you take if you lost a borrowed umbrella?
questions.postinstructions: 1 point for each category of actions:

inputs.label: 16c. What would you do if you found an envelope that was sealed, addressed, and had a new stamp?
inputs.name: envelope

questions.question: Repeat exactly what I say.

inputs.label: "He would like to go home." (2 sec)
inputs.name: repeathome

questions.preinstructions: (for each part, only score 1 if repeated exactly as given)
questions.question: "Now repeat:
Please do this:

scores.label: Reads correctly, but does not raise hand

questions.question: Let me have a sample of your handwriting.

inputs.label: Please write: He would like to go home. (1 min.)
inputs.postinstructions: (may dictate 1 word at a time, if necessary)
inputs.name: handwriting

questions.question: Please copy this.

questions.preinstructions: (note for this question, do not repeat any part of the commmand) (use non-dominant hand - 6 sec.)
questions.question: Take this paper with your
What 3 words did I ask you to remember?

scores.label: After: "One word was something to wear."
After: "Was it SHOES, SHIRT, or SOCKS?"
After: "Was it BLUE, BLACK or BROWN?"
After: "One word was a good personal quality."
After: "Was it HONESTY, MODESTY, or CHARITY?"

questions.question: What do we call this part of the body?
What is this?
questions.postinstructions: (show one at a time, any order OK. Show item: 2 sec.; if unable, place in hand: 4 sec. Objects either named or spontaneously or repeated correctly after coaching.)

questions.question: Remember these 5 objects.
What 5 objects did I just show you?
Validity of score

scores.label: Invalid: unable to read or write

questions.question: CASI Exam Status
